org.dmd.util
Class DmcOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      java.io.FilterOutputStream
          java.io.DataOutputStream
              org.dmd.util.DmcOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataOutput, java.io.Flushable, DmcOutputStreamIF
public class DmcOutputStream
extends java.io.DataOutputStream
implements DmcOutputStreamIF

The DmcOutputStream implements the DmcOutputStreamIF to allow Dark Matter Objects to be serialized to a DataOutputStream. Exactly what gets written to the output stream depends on the dataType of the attribute being written and on the mode in which the DmcOutputStream has been created.

The two modes are file mode and wire mode; this is controlled by how the DmcOutputStream is constructed.

Attributes of dataType TRANSIENT are never written to the stream.

Constructor Detail

DmcOutputStream

public DmcOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream os)
Constructs a new DmcOutputStream in file mode. Only PERSISTENT attributes will be written to the stream.

Parameters:
os - the output stream.

DmcOutputStream

public DmcOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream os,
                       boolean mode)
Constructs a new DmcOutputStream in the mode specified. All attributes but TRANSIENT ones will be written to the stream.

Parameters:
os - The output stream.
mode - true if this is file mode and false if it's wire mode.
